mapper.select: select average_price from province_price_statistics where province=#{province} and statistical_time > #{time} order by statistical_time desc limit 1
select province, average_price as 'provinceAveragePrice', week_growth_rate as 'provinceRate', prize_rank as 'provincePrizeRank' from province_price_statistics where statistical_time > #{time}

select province_price_statistics.province as 'province', province_price_statistics.average_price as 'provinceAveragePrice', province_price_statistics.week_growth_rate as 'provinceRate', province_price_statistics.statistical_time as 'statisticalTime' from province_price_statistics, (select province, MAX(statistical_time) as max_time from province_price_statistics group by province) as tmp where province_price_statistics.province = tmp.province and province_price_statistics.statistical_time = tmp.max_time

select province, average_price as 'averagePrice', week_growth_rate as 'weekGrowthRate', statistical_time as 'statisticalTime' from province_price_statistics where province = #{province} order by statistical_time DESC limit 1
select average_price as 'averagePrice', statistical_time as 'statisticalTime' from province_price_statistics where province = #{province} order by statisticalTime ASC
